docs.title: 🌱 GrowBeam – LED Modules for Plant Lighting
docs.text: GrowBeam is a modular LED lighting system designed for plant growth. The system consists of 2 × 5 modules mounted on an aluminum frame, powered by a constant current driver from Meanwell.

docs.title: Power Supply
docs.text:
• Driver: Meanwell ELG-240-42AB-3Y
  • Mode: Constant current
  • Nominal Output: 240W @ 42VDC
  • Set Output Current: 4.55 A
  • Configured for 10 modules (5 + 5)

docs.title: LED Configuration
docs.text:
Each module contains: - 6 strings × 12 white LEDs (SPMWHD32AMH0XAMAPL) - 1 string × 15 deep red LEDs (L1SP-DRD0002800000) - Total: 7 LED strings per module, all driven in parallel

Current per module: - 4.55 A / 10 modules = 455 mA per module - 455 mA / 7 strings ≈ 65 mA per string

docs.title: Forward Voltage (per string)
docs.text:
Type LEDs in series Est. Vf @ 65 mA Voltage White 12 ~3.2 V ~38.4 V Deep Red 15 ~2.3 V ~34.5 V

All well within the driver's 42 V output limit ✅

docs.title: Power and Light Output Per Module
docs.text: Type Count Current Power Output White LEDs 72 6×65 mA ~9.9 W ~1870 lumens Red LEDs 15 1×65 mA ~2.3 W ~1.5 W radiant (660 nm) Total – 455 mA ~12.2 W ~1870 lm + 1.5 W red

docs.title: System Totals (10 Modules)
docs.text:
• Total Current: 4.55 A
  • Total Power: ~122 W
  • Luminous Output: ~18,700 lumens
  • 660 nm Radiant Power: ~15 W

docs.title: PPF (Photosynthetic Photon Flux)
docs.text:
• White: 1870 lm / 70 ≈ 26.7 μmol/s
  • Red: 1.5 W × 4.58 μmol/s/W ≈ 6.87 μmol/s
  • PPF per module: ~33.6 μmol/s
  • Total PPF (10 modules): ~336 μmol/s

docs.title: PPFD in 90×60 cm Grow Tent
docs.text:
Tent area: 0.9 m × 0.6 m = 0.54 m²

\[ \text{PPFD} = \frac{336\,μmol/s}{0.54\,m²} ≈ extbf{622 μmol/m²/s} \]

docs.title: Summary
docs.text:
Application Recommended PPFD Your PPFD Outcome Microgreens / Lettuce 100–400 ✅ 622 Excellent growth Tomatoes / Peppers 600–900 ✅ 622 Very good / near optimal Cannabis Flowering 800–1000 ⚠️ 622 Slightly low, still usable

This system provides powerful and efficient lighting for high-performance plant growth in a compact 90×60 cm grow space.

docs.title: 🏗️ Mechanical Design
docs.text: Modules are mounted on a frame made from aluminum profiles.

docs.title: Frame Specification
docs.text:
• 2 vertical and 3 horizontal aluminum profiles
  • Fits 5 × 5 modules with even spacing
  • Center mounting plate for hanging or support

docs.title: PCB
docs.text:
• PCB size: 196 mm × 35 mm
  • Mounting holes for screw attachment to the frame
  • Silkscreen with LED type and polarity

docs.title: Assembly
docs.text:
• LEDs are mounted using reflow soldering
  • Modules are screwed to the aluminum frame
  • Wires are soldered and connected to +VDC and –VDC

docs.title: Operation & Safety
docs.text:
• The system is powered only via Meanwell ELG-240-42AB-3Y
  • Ensure proper heat dissipation via the frame and/or heatsinks
  • Do not operate without connected load

docs.title: Future Plans
docs.text:
• Temperature monitoring per module
  • PWM dimming via analog input on the driver
  • Sensor-based light control
